meanings.definition: Of a considerable size or amount.
meanings.sent1: The goodly tree provided ample shade on a hot day.
meanings.sent2: She carried a goodly amount of groceries in her arms.
meanings.sent3: The goodly cake was too big for the tiny plate.
meanings.sent4: The goodly mountain loomed large in the distance.
meanings.sent5: The goodly elephant stood tall among the other animals.

meanings.definition: In a good or pleasing manner.
meanings.sent1: She sang goodly during the performance.
meanings.sent2: The flowers smelled goodly in the garden.
meanings.sent3: He danced goodly, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone goodly on the happy couple.
meanings.sent5: The children played goodly in the park.

meanings.definition: In a handsome or attractive manner.
meanings.sent1: She dressed goodly for the special occasion.
meanings.sent2: The house was decorated goodly for the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat groomed itself goodly, looking elegant.
meanings.sent4: The stars sparkled goodly in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The model walked goodly down the runway.
